tutorial.content:
in this game, you will have to select which words are red flags in a series of spam emails.
click on words thast are suspecisous like \!THIS! make sure it is highlighted.
 there are also yellow flags like \?THIS!. it might look suspecious, so feel free to select it. but its fine if you miss it.
then just press 'verify' when your done. remember that there can be red flags in the senders address and the subject aswell.
tutorial.subject: The tutorial
tutorial.explanation: awsome. once you have veryfied your answer, you can press 'continue' to go to the first question

no 1.content:
Dear user, your account requires immediate verification to avoid suspension. Click the link below to secure your account now:
https:// \?paypa1-login.com/verify
 \!Urgent action required within 24 hours or funds will be frozen.
no 1.subject: Security Alert: Verify Your \?PayPa1 Account Now
no 1.explanation: The domain uses 'paypa1' instead of 'paypal' (\?), and the urgent threat of account suspension/fund freeze is a common phishing tactic (\!).

no 2.content:
We detected unusual activity on your Amazon account. Please review the attached invoice and confirm payment details to prevent service interruption.
 Attachment: Invoice_ \?0823.pdf.exe
no 2.subject: Action Required: Unusual Sign-in Attempt
no 2.explanation: The sender appears legitimate but could be spoofed (check full headers in real scenarios); the attachment has a double extension hiding an executable (\?), which is a major red flag (\!).

no 3.content:
Your Windows license will expire in 48 hours. Call our toll-free number \?1-800-555-0199 to renew immediately and avoid system lockout.
 \!Do not ignore this official Microsoft notification.
no 3.subject: Windows License Expiration Warning
no 3.explanation: Domain uses 'micros0ft' with a zero instead of 'o' (\?), and pressuring the user to call a phone number for 'renewal' is a tech support scam hallmark (\!).

no 4.content:
A new device has logged into your Bank of America account from an unrecognized location. If this wasn't you, click here to secure your account:
https:// \?bofa-secure-login.com/reset
Transaction ID: \?BOA-7834921
no 4.subject: Unauthorized Login Attempt Detected
no 4.explanation: The domain is not the official bankofamerica.com (\?), and fake transaction IDs are used to create legitimacy while pushing for credential entry (\!).

no 5.content:
Congratulations! You've been selected for the Senior Developer position. To proceed with onboarding, please provide your SSN, bank details, and a copy of your ID via the secure portal:
https:// \?companyname-hr.com/onboard
 \!Offer expires in 48 hours.
no 5.subject: Job Offer - Immediate Action Required
no 5.explanation: Asking for SSN and bank details before any interview or official paperwork is a job scam red flag (\!), and the domain is slightly off from the real company (\?).

no 6.content:
We noticed a sign-in to your Google Account on a new device. If this was you, no action is needed. If you don't recognize this activity, secure your account here:
https://myaccount.google.com/security-checkup
no 6.subject: Security alert
no 6.explanation: Official Google domain, no urgency threats, provides a clear official link, and offers a no-action option if legitimate.

no 7.content:
Your two-factor authentication recovery code is: 1234 5678
This code expires in 10 minutes. Do not share it with anyone, including GitHub support.
no 7.subject: Your GitHub recovery code
no 7.explanation: Official GitHub domain, provides a time-limited code without asking for additional info, and warns against sharing.

no 8.content:
WINNER! Ticket \?#EM-7741 has won €950,000 in the EuroMillions draw. To claim your prize, pay a processing fee of €499 via Bitcoin to the wallet below:
 \!bc1qxy2kgdygjrsqtzq2ntkt9n3z0k8qr7jemh... (truncated)
 \!You must pay within 72 hours or forfeit the prize.
no 8.subject: EuroMillions Winner - Claim Your €950,000 Now!
no 8.explanation: Asking for upfront payment in Bitcoin to 'claim' a prize is a classic lottery scam (\!), and the domain is not official (\?).

no 9.content:
Your Apple ID has been locked for security reasons. Unlock it by entering your password and credit card details here:
https:// \?appleid.apple.com/unlock
 \!Failure to comply will result in permanent disablement.
no 9.subject: Apple ID Locked - Immediate Action Needed
no 9.explanation: Official Apple communications never ask for full credit card details via email, and the domain is spoofed (\?). Threat of permanent disablement is a coercion tactic (\!).

no 10.content:
Your Spotify Premium subscription will renew on November 15, 2025 for $10.99. To manage or cancel, visit:
https://www.spotify.com/account/subscription/
no 10.subject: Upcoming Spotify Premium renewal
no 10.explanation: Official domain, transparent billing info, no urgency, and directs to the official account page without asking for credentials.
